Summary: Two objects, taveling in parallel lines, one slightly behind the other. Silver/white in color.
divs: sighting detailsseveral of us were on the ferry between southport and ft. fisher, north carolina, crossing the cape fear and witnessed the objects. they traveled slowly in parallel lines, keeping the exact distance apart, and exact speed apart, and exact width apart until they disappeared out of sight into cloud cover. the objects were cigar shaped and looked to be white\silver in appearance. it was still daylight at the time and no lights were seen. there was no sound, or if there was, it was not heard over the ferry engines. several passengers were pointing at the objects overhead and that is what made me look up. at first, i thought it was two airplanes. i have never reported a ufo or thought i have seen one, until now. it felt very strange to look up and see these two objects flying directly overhead and over the water. it looked like they were heading out into the atlantic ocean as they got further and further out of sight, they got smaller and smaller to the naked eye, but you could still see them in the distance, until they went into the clouds.
